website_summaries.verdict: Another top make that’s tried and trusted. Much used by professional equestrians.
pros: Suitable for front or rear legs, the foam panel and ergonomic design provides a great fit
Offers high levels of support and protection
Super easy to use without double-lock Velcro, yet can still go through water and mud without slipping
cons: Reports of some fraying after consistent use

customer_reviews.title: Great product - wrong size
customer_reviews.text: Look great, love the construction. Will be exchanging for a larger size. Ordered a small for my pony based on suggestions from other reviewers and they're a bit snug. Have attached pic of the size chart that came with the wraps.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Great product, horse approved
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to me by several grooms and trainers. I have a large cannon yet short leg warmblood mare. She requires a large circumference yet short height boot. These are the only boots that fit her fronts in a medium with room to spare. Their so easy to clean and put on. They also stay dry in wet and hot weather. My horse is clear she likes these for her work and I like them for cost/ease of use. I ended up buying another set in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Somatique

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product for a Nice Price!
customer_reviews.text: These brushing boots perform well, wash up easily, and seem to last, all for a much more affordable price than many other similar support boots. I use these for schooling and trailering my horse locally. I love the price and color options and have several sets of these I rotate on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: Beth Mason in NC

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Here is a size large next to a Horze size large
customer_reviews.text: These are great brushing boots! The large fits my 17h WB fronts very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots. I use them for cross country on my mare and they are amazing. I would suggest using some electric tape to keep the Velcro attached since it's not double lock. But these boots are great otherwise. I love the different colors. Really helps with cross country color themes!! And since they're neoprene they work well with water and don't weigh down at all. And are incredibly easy to wash. Will definitely be buying more pairs in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Lori J. Trautschold

customer_reviews.title: Love these brushing boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these brushing boots. They are easy to put on and remove, comfortable and protective on the horses legs, and are very washable. Also they are reasonably priced and can be purchased in fun colors.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine E Meadow

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting
customer_reviews.text: My horse is hard on boots and the Wolf Wear Sport Boots last a long time. My horse also has big feet and really needs the boots which provide excellent protection.
customer_reviews.author: Harley's owner

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: The boots are great and everything arrived on time and like described. Bought a size large for a 16 hh TB for hid brushing boots, fits very well. Went through water well and cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Bookgirl4518

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Durable
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years in light to medium footing. Not the best for deep footing.
customer_reviews.author: Celia Norman

customer_reviews.title: Always buy these!
customer_reviews.text: Economical,long lasting boot. This is one of my old standby favorites. The price is right, they wash and dry and last a very long time, even used for turnout. This is about my 9th pair.
customer_reviews.author: June Scholl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Always a solid choice. I use them to both jump and hack at home
customer_reviews.author: Chad Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Return policy
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed that the medium boots were too small for my horse. And quite unhappy that I was unable to return or exchange the boots!! I won’t order products for my horse from Amazon again!!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.text: I've used the same set of woof boots on my horse (every ride) for the last 3 years and they are still going strong. Just bought this set as a gift for a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Beth M.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice color and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: So far they have held up to “destructo thoroughbred” which is quite a feat!
customer_reviews.author: Merideth Hebert

customer_reviews.title: They are extremely durable and the variety of colors should satisfy most anyone's needs
customer_reviews.text: Used these boots for years. They are extremely durable and the variety of colors should satisfy most anyone's needs. Easy on and off. I've used them in all sorts of circumstances and they've worked beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: They hold up well. Easy on and off. Both my WB 16 hand horses do well with mediums in front and large in the back.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product and service
customer_reviews.text: These boots are easy to put on and maintain. Nice color selection and reasonable price. Item arrived promptly.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick
customer_reviews.text: Some fraying around edges after about a month of use
customer_reviews.author: A Hoffmann

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. My 15.3 mare wears a small upfront and a large behind. The smalls a little smaller than I'd like but the mediums were too long and covered part of the knee bone.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: Hold up very well! Ride 2-3 times per week. Easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah LoPresto

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Ordered a PAIR of Medium boots for my horse and I received ONE Large boot...
customer_reviews.author: Haley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my horse (Dutch Warmblood). Easy to put on, do not slip and great looking. Overall Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great! Ordered them in white and they look sharp ...
customer_reviews.text: Great! Ordered them in white and they look sharp on a bay horse. Really easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly What I Ordered!
customer_reviews.text: Boots are super easy on and off, good quality and a great fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: Best price I have found online for these great boots
customer_reviews.author: shanablum

customer_reviews.title: My TB is pretty rough on his boots
customer_reviews.text: These are ok. My TB is pretty rough on his boots, but still these only made it 1 month.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Bryson

customer_reviews.title: Simple, quality brushing boots
customer_reviews.text: I switched to Woof Wear brushing boots from Professional's Choice Sport Medicine Boots because I wanted more air circulation around my horses's legs. There's not much evidence that boots support tendons and I wanted to protect his legs from interference while we are riding without making his legs too warm. The brushing boots go on quickly and are easy to clean. The XL fit both the fronts and hinds of my 18 hand American Warmblood. I wish there were more color options in the larger sizes; draft horse problems. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W

customer_reviews.title: Great boots in a hard-to-find size
customer_reviews.text: I have used these boots for several years. But trying to find XL isn't easy. The price and shipping time were excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Don Chalant

customer_reviews.title: Talk about durable!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using one set of boots on a daily basis with three different horses and they've lasted 9 years. Used them for schooling and XC. They still look brand new for being almost a decade old. Unfortunately, the velcro is not as strong anymore and there is a tiny hole that's starting to form in one of the boots. Now time for a new set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: WOOF WEAR Sport Brushing Boots
product_meta.description:
Woof Wear Sport Brushing Boots For the support and protection needed when riding cross country, these boots are the best! Features include soft, breathable PX closed cell neoprene vents to encourage airflow, a highly strengthened foam panel to protect from impact and ergonomic design to mold around the leg and fetlock joint. Perfect for all terrains and conditions, these boots are suitable for front or hind legs. Sold as a pair. Features: Offers support and protection Vents for airflow Foam panel for protection Ergonomic design Suitable for front or hind legs Item Specifications: Materials: Neoprene Foam
